marker.ph: /// Class housing all items required to parse DISA STIG *.ckl scan files. ...
/// Reads *.ckl files exported from the DISA STIG Viewer and writes the results to the appropriate DataTables. ...
/// Class housing all items required to parse DISA STIG *.ckl scan files. ...
/// Reads *.ckl files exported from the DISA STIG Viewer and writes the results to the appropriate DataTables. ...

<<FrameworkElement.CommandBindings> <CommandBinding Command="{x:Static wpf:Commands.Hyperlink}" Executed="OpenHyperlink" /> </FrameworkElement.CommandBindings> <UserControl.Resources> <Converters:HtmlToFlowDocumentConverter x:Key="HtmlToFlowDocumentConverter" /> </UserControl.Resources> <Grid Background="{DynamicResource WindowBackgroundBrush}"> <Controls:MetroAnimatedSingleRowTabControl Margin="5,0,0,0" Controls:TabControlHelper.Underlined="SelectedTabItem"> <TabItem Header="Issues" Style="{StaticResource CustomMetroTabItem}"> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Expander Margin="0,5" Background="{DynamicResource WindowBackgroundBrush}" BorderThickness="0" ExpandDirection="Right" IsExpanded="False"> <Expander.Header> <Label Foreground="{DynamicResource LabelTextBrush}"> <Label.LayoutTransform> <RotateTransform Angle="90" /> </Label.LayoutTransform> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <IconPacks:PackIconOcticons Grid.Column="0" Margin="5" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" Kind="IssueOpened"> <IconPacks:PackIconOcticons.LayoutTransform> <RotateTransform Angle="-90" /> </IconPacks:PackIconOcticons.LayoutTransform> </IconPacks:PackIconOcticons> <TextBlock Grid.Column="1" Margin="5,0" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" Foreground="{DynamicResource LabelTextBrush}" Text="Open Issues" TextTrimming="CharacterEllipsis" /> </Grid> </Label> </Expander.Header> <ListBox x:Name="issueListBox" DisplayMemberPath="Title" ItemsSource="{Binding IssueList}" /> </Expander> <Grid Grid.Column="1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid Grid.Row="0" Margin="5,0"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Label Grid.Column="0" Style="{StaticResource TopLevelHeaderStyle}"> <TextBlock Text="Issue: " TextTrimming="CharacterEllipsis" /> </Label> <Label Grid.Column="1" Style="{StaticResource TopLevelHeaderStyle}"> <TextBlock Text="{Binding ElementName=issueListBox, Path=SelectedItem.Title}" TextWrapping="Wrap" /> </Label> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="1"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition Width=".25*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid Margin="5,0"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Label Grid.Column="0" Style="{StaticResource ThirdLevelHeaderStyle}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <IconPacks:PackIconMaterial Margin="0,0,5,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Kind="Pound" ToolTip="Issue Number" /> <TextBlock VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="{Binding ElementName=issueListBox, Path=SelectedItem.Number}" TextTrimming="CharacterEllipsis" /> </StackPanel> </Label> <Label Grid.Column="1" Style="{StaticResource ThirdLevelHeaderStyle}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <IconPacks:PackIconMaterial Margin="0,0,5,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Kind="CommentMultipleOutline" ToolTip="Comments" /> <TextBlock VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="{Binding ElementName=issueListBox, Path=SelectedItem.Comments}" TextTrimming="CharacterEllipsis" /> </StackPanel> </Label> <Label Grid.Column="2" Style="{StaticResource ThirdLevelHeaderStyle}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <IconPacks:PackIconOcticons Margin="0,0,5,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Kind="Milestone" ToolTip="Milestone" /> <TextBlock VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="{Binding ElementName=issueListBox, Path=SelectedItem.Milestone}" TextTrimming="CharacterEllipsis" /> </StackPanel> </Label> <Label Grid.Column="3" Style="{StaticResource ThirdLevelHeaderStyle}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <IconPacks:PackIconOcticons Margin="0,0,5,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Kind="Browser" /> <TextBlock HorizontalAlignment="Stretch" Style="{StaticResource HyperlinkTextBlockStyle}" Text="View on GitHub" TextTrimming="CharacterEllipsis" ToolTip="{Binding ElementName=issueListBox, Path=SelectedItem.HtmlUrl}"> <TextBlock.InputBindings> <MouseBinding Command="{Binding GitHubLinksCommand}" CommandParameter="{Binding ElementName=issueListBox, Path=SelectedItem.HtmlUrl}" MouseAction="LeftClick" /> </TextBlock.InputBindings> </TextBlock> </StackPanel> </Label> </Grid> <Grid Grid.RowSpan="2" Grid.Column="1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Label Style="{StaticResource ThirdLevelHeaderStyle}"> <TextBlock Text="Assigned Labels" TextTrimming="CharacterEllipsis" /> </Label> <ListView Grid.Row="1" Margin="0,0,5,5" BorderBrush="{DynamicResource TextBoxBorderBrush}" BorderThickness="1" ItemsSource="{Binding ElementName=issueListBox, Path=SelectedItem.Labels}" ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility="Disabled"> <ListView.ItemContainerStyle> <Style TargetType="Control"> <Setter Property="Focusable" Value="False" /> </Style> </ListView.ItemContainerStyle> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <Grid Margin="2"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Rectangle Width="5" VerticalAlignment="Stretch" Fill="{Binding Color}" /> <TextBlock Grid.Column="1" Margin="5,0,0,0" Text="{Binding Name}" TextTrimming="CharacterEllipsis" TextWrapping="NoWrap" /> </Grid> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate> </ListView> <Label Grid.Row="2" Style="{StaticResource ThirdLevelHeaderStyle}"> <TextBlock Text="Label Categories" TextTrimming="CharacterEllipsis" /> </Label> <ListView Grid.Row="3" Margin="0,0,5,5" BorderBrush="{DynamicResource TextBoxBorderBrush}" BorderThickness="1" ItemsSource="{Binding IssueLabelCategoryList}" ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility="Disabled"> <ListView.ItemContainerStyle> <Style TargetType="Control"> <Setter Property="Focusable" Value="False" /> </Style> </ListView.ItemContainerStyle> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <Grid Margin="2"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Rectangle Width="{Binding RelativeSource={RelativeSource Self}, Path=ActualHeight}" VerticalAlignment="Stretch" Fill="{Binding Color}" /> <TextBlock Grid.Column="1" Margin="5,0,0,0" Text="{Binding Category}" TextTrimming="CharacterEllipsis" TextWrapping="NoWrap" /> </Grid> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate> </ListView> </Grid> <Border ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Auto" /> </Border> </Grid> </Grid> </Grid> </TabItem> <TabItem Header="Releases" Style="{StaticResource CustomMetroTabItem}"> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
